hiveArticle.title: Steemit is Revamped with New Logo and Night Mode
hiveArticle.body:
From Blue to Green, a significant changes happen in Steemit today morning. As you can see the steemit logo is changed along with the Post button is changed from Dark Blue to Black with the green little background.

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmbAeyD5czdfxeoGgZnpp2TNJSL148rJ5QpswREKVLum6y/image.png)

Now you also have an option to Night Mode, which you can change by clicking the Profile Pic.

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmat3RfzP2b6MYoq1pP8fGbw1VhtPgKtmrQF72ZPpsb8XF/image.png)

New Night Mode

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmSMuFEHfMA7UN7CgNLNde9YjFEXcrjxdQnBgij1sUGg7c/image.png)

What do you think about these changes. Do comment
